//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "trapped_guy_one", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "DEFAULT" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_ANIM_LOOP", "ON" );
	set ( "SET_NOCLIP", "ON" );

	loop ( -1 )
	{

		task ( "typing" )
		{
			set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Interaction|Full+None+Normal+Sit|Keyboard" );
		}

		dowait ( "typing" );
	}

}
